noun.description: The twenty-sixth letter of the alphabet.
A shape like that of a capital Z.
examples: the same old Z-shaped crack in the paving stone

noun.description: Used in repeated form to represent the sound of buzzing or snoring.
examples: I'm being overcome with weariness as I write â€¦ zzzzz, zzzzz

phrases: I'll go back to the hotel and catch some Zs
Why is it whenever I try to catch some Zs all I can hear is you two squawking?
I was catching a few Zs on the lower bunk in our call room.
